myths.title: Test Myth 1
myths.myth_statement: All snakes are dangerous and venomous
myths.fact_explanation: Most snakes are actually non-venomous and help control pest populations

myths.title: Test Fact 1
myths.fact_explanation: Elephants can indeed remember other elephants and locations for decades

myths.title: Test Myth 2
myths.fact_explanation: Tigers are primarily nocturnal hunters and prefer to hunt at dawn and dusk
